fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Forge a player’s documents each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- As you forge a player’s documents, you may choose a role and write a last will. 
- If your forged target dies that night, they will appear to have been the role that you chose, and their last will will appear as the last will you wrote.
- You may only forge twice.
